ygData.subject: maven and ant build
ygData.msgSnippet: Currently you can build heritrix with maven and ant.  The maven build is more complete in that it generates all of documentation and the site at

Subject: maven and ant build
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

Currently you can build heritrix with maven and ant.  The maven build is 
more complete in that it generates all of documentation and the site at 
http://crawler.archive.org.  Because its work keeping up the two systems 
and seeing as how the ant build will always be lacking compared to the 
maven product -- unless we do a bunch of work -- I'd like to drop 
support for ant building.  Unless any objections in the next few days or 
so, I'll proceed.
Thanks,
St.Ack
